name: memorable
description: Enterprise memory system for AI agents with salience scoring, commitment tracking, relationship intelligence, pressure tracking, and predictive memory. Extends Mem0 with 35 MCP tools for Claude integration.

tools.name: store_memory
tools.description: Store a memory with automatic salience scoring and security tiering

tools.name: recall
tools.description: Search and retrieve memories by query, person, or salience threshold

tools.name: get_briefing
tools.description: Get pre-conversation briefing with obligations, events, and sensitivities

tools.name: forget
tools.description: Delete a specific memory by ID

tools.name: forget_person
tools.description: Delete all memories involving a specific person

tools.name: restore
tools.description: Restore a previously deleted memory

tools.name: list_loops
tools.description: List open commitments filtered by owner, person, or overdue status

tools.name: close_loop
tools.description: Mark a commitment as complete with optional note

tools.name: reassociate
tools.description: Update people, topics, tags, and project associations

tools.name: export_memories
tools.description: Export memories with optional password encryption

tools.name: set_context
tools.description: Set multi-device aware context (location, people, activity, mood)

tools.name: whats_relevant
tools.description: Query device-specific or unified context for relevance

tools.name: clear_context
tools.description: Clear specific context dimensions

tools.name: list_devices
tools.description: List active devices and their context status

tools.name: get_status
tools.description: Get system status, metrics, relationships, and patterns

tools.name: anticipate
tools.description: 21-day pattern learning with calendar integration for predictions

tools.name: day_outlook
tools.description: Get daily behavioral predictions and likely topics

tools.name: pattern_stats
tools.description: View learning progress metrics and pattern confidence

tools.name: memory_feedback
tools.description: Reinforce predictions with used/ignored/dismissed signals

tools.name: identify_user
tools.description: Identify user by message behavioral fingerprinting

tools.name: behavioral_metrics
tools.description: ASCII visualization dashboards with recognition accuracy

tools.name: behavioral_feedback
tools.description: Improve recognition accuracy through feedback

tools.name: import_memories
tools.description: Import memories from backup with optional password decryption

tools.name: analyze_emotion
tools.description: Analyze emotional content of text or memory using Hume.ai

tools.name: get_emotional_context
tools.description: Get real-time emotion state from active streams

tools.name: set_emotion_filter
tools.description: Configure emotion-based content filtering rules

tools.name: get_emotion_filters
tools.description: Get currently configured emotion filters

tools.name: get_memories_by_emotion
tools.description: Search memories by emotional content

tools.name: correct_emotion
tools.description: Override emotion tags when detection got it wrong (sarcasm≠anger)

tools.name: clarify_intent
tools.description: Annotate what was meant vs what was said (truth beneath words)

tools.name: get_relationship
tools.description: Synthesize relationship from shared memories via LLM (no stored graph)

tools.name: get_entity_pressure
tools.description: Butterfly → Hurricane early warning - track emotional pressure patterns

tools.name: get_predictions
tools.description: Surface memories before you ask based on context hooks

tools.name: record_prediction_feedback
tools.description: Teach the system what predictions are useful

tools.name: set_care_circle
tools.description: Set who gets alerted when entity pressure is concerning

resources.name: Recent Memories
resources.description: Recent high-salience memories from the past week

resources.name: Contacts
resources.description: Active and cold relationships with interaction data

prompts.name: daily_briefing
prompts.description: Summary of attention items for the day

prompts.name: person_context
prompts.description: Full briefing before conversation with a specific person

arguments.name: person
arguments.description: Name of the person to get context for

tiers.name: Tier1_General
tiers.description: Public data, can be sent to external LLMs

tiers.name: Tier3_Vault
tiers.description: Sensitive data (PII, financial, medical), AES-256-GCM encrypted, no LLM access

databases.name: MongoDB
databases.purpose: Document storage for memories, relationships, patterns
